globalOffices.title: Ibikorwa by’Isi Yose by’Inyamburano
globalOffices.subtitle: Shaka ibiro byacu by’isi yose, umenye serivisi tuzirikura mu buri mwanya

teamMembers.title: Itsinda Ryacu ry’Isi Yose
teamMembers.subtitle: Amahitamo y’abahinga bo mu nzego zose zacu
teamMembers.noMembers: Nta bantu bari mu itsinda basanzwe bashinzwe iyi biro

pierre-kemeni.name: Pierre KEMENI
pierre-kemeni.title: Umuyobozi Mukuru & Umukuru w’Inteko
pierre-kemeni.bio: Umufatanya, Umuyobozi Mukuru muri EXCI-MAA Group. Umucungamari wemewe na COSUMAF hamwe na Auditor wemewe n’amategeko. Yanditswe muri ICPAR, ONECCA, CPA Canada, Quebec, Ontario & UK. Mbere yari Umuyobozi w’Inshingano muri Deloitte Toronto. Umuhango mu buyobozi, SYSCOHADA, Ihinduka ry’Imikoreshereze. Umushiguzi w’Abahanga b’amahanga n’Umutoza.

patrick-ngatcha.name: Patrick NGATCHA
patrick-ngatcha.title: Umufatanya - Umuyobozi Mukuru
patrick-ngatcha.bio: Umucungamari wanditswe muri Institute of Chartered Accountants ya Paris Ile de France. Auditor wemewe n’amategeko. Umuhango mu misoro n’isuzuma ry’imari, isuzuma ry’ubuguzi, gufatanya (itegeko 99-02 / IFRS).

cloudin-ngong.name: Cloudin NGONG
cloudin-ngong.title: Umunyamabanga - Ishami ry’Imicungamari
cloudin-ngong.bio: Umunyeshuri w’imari w’umuhango mu misoro n’isuzuma ry’imari. Yongera kuyobora ibikorwa by’ishami ry’Imicungamari.

janot-hiag.name: Janot HIAG
janot-hiag.title: Umushikiranganji & Isuzuma ry’Igiciro cy’Ipétrole
janot-hiag.bio: Umuhango mu isuzuma ry’igiciro cy’ipétrole, umutekano w’amafranga yinjira, urutonde rw’ibintu n’ihinduka ry’igiciro, isuzuma ry’ibikorwa n’amategeko, hamwe n’isuzuma ry’amategeko.

eric-kabeza.name: Eric KABEZA
eric-kabeza.title: Umufatanya Mukuru w’Imisoro - Rwanda
eric-kabeza.bio: Umuhango mu misoro y’igihugu n’amahanga hamwe n’imyaka isaga 20 akora muri Rwanda Revenue Authority. Umushiguzi/Umujyanama mu misoro y’amasosiyete n’abantu ku giti cyabo. Umunyamabanga w’ukurikiza imisoro n’umushungura w’amategeko.

jean-nahimana.name: Jean Berchmas
jean-nahimana.title: Umufatanya - Isuzuma ry’Imari n’Imisoro
jean-nahimana.bio: Umucungamari, Umunyamuryango wa ICPAR. Isuzuma ry’imari n’imisoro. Umunyeshuri Mukuru w’imikoreshereze n’umwibutsa w’imari w’umuhango n’uburambe mu igenamigambi ry’imari n’ishungura.

martin-nkwain.name: Marcel NKWAIN
martin-nkwain.title: Umuyobozi w’Intara - Afrika y’Iburasirazuba
martin-nkwain.bio: Umuhango wa HARDCAT mu kuyobora ibintu by’umutungo. Isuzuma ry’imari n’imisoro. Umushiguzi w’amahanga n’umutoza uyobora ibikorwa bya EXCI-MAA muri Afrika y’Iburasirazuba.

paul-tchamake.name: Olivier Fodji
paul-tchamake.title: Umufatanya - Imisoro y’Amahanga & Igiciro cy’Intara
paul-tchamake.bio: Umucungamari wemewe (Sisitemu y’Amerika na France). Umuhango mu misoro y’amahanga, ASC 740 (Amabwiriza ya US GAAP). Imyaka isaga 15 y’uburambe mu bitangaza imari n’imisoro y’amahanga hamwe n’uburambe muri Big 4 muri KPMG na PwC Amerika. Umuhango mu giciro cy’intara na BEPS.

diane-dusabe.name: Diane DUSABE
diane-dusabe.title: Umuyobozi w’Ibiro - Burundi
diane-dusabe.bio: Umuyobozi w’ibiro w’uburambe uyobora ibikorwa bya EXCI-MAA muri Burundi. Umuhango mu mibanire y’abakiriya n’iterambere ry’ubucuruzi bw’ahandi.

onesphore-ofodji.name: Onesphore OFODJI
onesphore-ofodji.title: Umushiguzi Mukuru - Burundi
onesphore-ofodji.bio: Umushiguzi w’ubucuruzi w’umuhango mu iterambere ry’amasoko y’intara na serivisi z’inama z’imari ku bucuruzi muri Burundi.

congo-director.name: Umuyobozi w’Intara
congo-director.title: Umuyobozi - Ibikorwa bya RDC
congo-director.bio: Uyobora ibikorwa bya EXCI-MAA muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, aganira ku bikorwa by’isuzuma na serivisi z’inama z’ubucuruzi.

gabon-manager.name: Umuyobozi w’Intara
gabon-manager.title: Umuyobozi - Ibikorwa bya Gabon
gabon-manager.bio: Kuyobora serivisi za EXCI-MAA muri Gabon aganira ku isuzuma ry’imari na serivisi z’inama z’amasosiyete ku bakiriya b’ahandi n’amahanga.

dubai-consultant.name: Umushiguzi Mukuru
dubai-consultant.title: Umushiguzi w’Ubucuruzi Mukuru - Dubai
dubai-consultant.bio: Umuhango mu gutangiza ubucuruzi bw’amahanga n’igenamigambi ry’imisoro ku masosiyete ashyiraho amasoko muri Aziya y’Uburasirazuba.

france-partner.name: Umufatanya
france-partner.title: Umufatanya - Ibikorwa bya France
france-partner.bio: Uyobora ibikorwa by’Uburaya n’ubuhanga mu kurikiza amategeko ya EU na serivisi z’inama z’ihuzamahanga.

canada-consultant.name: Umushiguzi Mukuru
canada-consultant.title: Umushiguzi w’Abimukira & Imisoro
canada-consultant.bio: Umuhango mu serivisi z’ubumukira bwa Canada n’igenamigambi ry’imisoro y’amahanga ku bimukira bashya na masosiyete.

footer.description: Ikigo cy'ubucuruzi, cy'ubugenzuzi, n'ubunyangamugayo cyifite amaofisi bw'isi. Dutanga ubuhanga buhagije gufasha ibyo ukeneye.

hero.title: Ubucuruzi bw'ubuhanga &
hero.subtitle: Serivisi z'ubucuruzi, ubugenzuzi, n'ubunyangamugayo zifite ubwoba bw'isi. Dutanga ibisubizo by'ubuhanga gufasha ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi bwawe.
hero.description: Dutanga ibisubizo bishasha mu vy'umutungo n'imburi y'ubuyobozi kugira dufashe amashirahamwe n'abantu kugendera mu bice vy'umutungo bigoye n'uko vyoshe, bafise ukwizigira n'ukusobanukirwa.

about.subtitle: Menya byinshi ku kigo cyacu n'ibyiringiro
about.feature1Desc: Dukomeza ubwoba bw'ubuhanga mu serivisi zacu zose
about.feature2Desc: Gufasha abakiriya mu mahanga menshi n'amashyira
about.feature3Desc: Abahanga bacu bafite ubuhanga batanga ibisubizo by'ubwoba

hero.description: Ikipe yacu y'abahanga b'ubucuruzi iteguye gufasha mu kuyobora ingorane z'ubucuruzi bwawe. Kwandikira binyuze mu nzira icyo ari cyo cyose cyo hepfo cyangwa dutangire ubutumwa buhagije.

contactMethods.callDescription: Ku wa Mbere-Ku wa Gatanu kuva saa saba n'ijoro kugeza saa tatu n'ijoro
contactMethods.hoursValue: Ku wa Mbere - Ku wa Gatanu: 9:00 - 18:00

hero.orFillOut: Cyangwa uzuze urupapuro rwacu rw'ubwoba kandi tuzagaruka mu masaha 24.

form.title: Kwandikira
form.subtitle: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa witeguye gutangira ubwoba bwawe? Uzuza urupapuro rwo hepfo kandi ikipe yacu izagaruka vuba.
form.description: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa witeguye gutangira ubwoba bwawe? Uzuza urupapuro rwo hepfo kandi ikipe yacu izagaruka vuba.
form.contactDescription: Uzuza urupapuro kandi ikipe yacu izagaruka mu masaha 24. Kugira ngo uhabwe ubufasha buhagije, nyamuneka dutangire buhagije.
form.mondayFriday: Ku wa Mbere - Ku wa Gatanu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
form.saturdaySunday: Ku wa Gatandatu - Ku cyumweru: Birafungiye
form.name: Izina
form.subject: Icyo ukeneye
form.successDescription: Murakoze kwandikira. Twakiriye ubutumwa bwawe kandi tuzagaruka mu masaha 24.
form.errorMessage: Kohereza ubutumwa byanze. Nyamuneka ugerageze nanone.
form.privacyNote: Tuzagaruka mu masaha 24. Amakuru yawe ari mu mutekano.

map.description: Dusura mu mabiro yacu yahagaze neza. Turimo gufasha mu byo ukeneye byose by'ubucuruzi.
map.helpDescription: Amabiro yacu yahagaze mu gace k'ubucuruzi kandi yoroshye kugera ku nzira z'ubucuruzi.

officeLocation.hours: Ku wa Mbere - Ku wa Gatanu: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM

faq.title: Ibibazo by'ubwoba
faq.description: Shakisha ibisubizo ku bibazo by'ubwoba ku serivisi zacu, uburyo bwo gukora, n'uburyo dushobora gufasha ubucuruzi bwawe gukura.

questions.question: Ni ikihe serivisi EXCI-MAA itanga?
questions.answer: Tutanga serivisi z'ubwoba z'ubucuruzi, ubugenzuzi, umusoro, n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi zashyizweho ku byo ukeneye by'ubwoba by'ibikoresho mu Arabiya Sawudite n'ibindi. Serivisi zacu zirimo raporo z'ubucuruzi, gutezimbere umusoro, ubugenzuzi bw'ubwoba, n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi.

questions.question: Nshobora gute gutegura ubunyangamugayo?
questions.answer: Urashobora gutegura ubunyangamugayo binyuze mu gutangira amabiro yacu, kutangira imeyili, cyangwa gukoresha urupapuro rw'ubwoba ku rupapuro rwacu. Ikipe yacu izagaruka mu masaha 24 kugira ngo ikemeze umunsi wawe.

questions.question: Ni ikihe gikoresho mufite ubuhanga?
questions.answer: Dufite ubuhanga bw'ubwoba mu gukorana n'ibikoresho bitandukanye birimo ubwoba bw'abantu, ubwoba, kugurisha, ikoranabuhanga, n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubwoba. Ikipe yacu ifite ubuhanga bwo gukora n'ingorane z'ubucuruzi z'ubwoba z'ubwoba.

questions.question: Ni ikihe amasaha y'amabiro yanyu?
questions.answer: Amabiro yacu yafunguye kuva ku cyumweru kugeza ku wa Kane, 9:00 AM kugeza 6:00 PM. Turafungiye ku wa Gatanu na Gatandatu hamwe n'umunsi mukuru.

questions.question: Mutanga serivisi z'ubwoba cyangwa z'ubwoba?
questions.answer: Yego, tutanga ubunyangamugayo bw'ubwoba n'ubwoba kugira ngo dukemere ibyo abakiriya bacu bakeneye. Ikipe yacu ifite ibikoresho by'ubwoba by'ubwoba byo gutanga serivisi y'ubwoba ku bwoba.

questions.question: Mukemera gute ubwoba bw'amakuru n'ubwoba?
questions.answer: Dutanga ubwoba bw'amakuru ku bwoba. Amakuru yose y'abakiriya akorwa n'ubwoba bw'ubwoba kandi akurinda gukoresha uburyo bwo gukurinda bwo gukoresha, harimo ubwoba n'uburyo bwo gukurinda amakuru.

faq.stillHaveDescription: Ntushobora gushakisha igisubizo ushakisha? Ikipe yacu irimo gufasha. Kwandikira kandi tuzagaruka vuba.
faq.callDescription: Ku wa Mbere kugeza ku wa Gatanu, saa saba n'ijoro kugeza saa tatu n'ijoro
faq.expertsDescription: Ikipe yacu y'abahanga irimo gusubiza ibibazo icyo ari cyo cyose ushobora kugira.

pierre.name: Pierre KEMENI
pierre.title: MBA, CPA, DEC
pierre.description: Umuhinga mu bikorwa vy'ubucungamari no kugenzura, afise imyaka irenga 27 y'uburambe mu bikorwa mpuzamakungu.

patrick.name: Patrick NGATCHA
patrick.title: DEC, DSCG, Master CCA, MSTCF
patrick.description: Umuhinga mu bucungamari no kugenzura afise imyaka irenga 13 mu guteza imbere ibikorwa n'ubujyanama mu mafaranga.

hero.title: Guhindura Ubucuruzi bwawe hamwe na
hero.subtitle: Menya uburyo serivisi zacu z'ubucuruzi z'ubwoba zishobora gutuma ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi bukura, zikemeza ukwemera, kandi zongere ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi bwawe.

detailedServices.title: Serivisi zacu
detailedServices.subtitle: Ibisubizo by'ubucuruzi byashyizweho ku byo ukeneye by'ubwoba, kandi bituma ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi bukura.

accounting.title: Kubara n'ubwoba
accounting.description: Ikipe yacu y'ubuhanga bwo kubara itanga serivisi z'ubwoba z'ubwoba zo gukomeza amakuru y'ubucuruzi y'ubwoba n'ubwoba. Dukora ibintu byose kuva ku bikorwa by'umunsi ku munsi kugeza ku raporo z'ubucuruzi z'ubwoba, dukemeza ukwemera ku ntego zose z'ubwoba.

audit.title: Ubugenzuzi n'ubwoba
audit.description: Serivisi zacu z'ubugenzuzi zitanga ukwemera kw'ubwoba kw'amakuru y'ubucuruzi yawe, zikemeza ukwemera n'ukwemera ku ntego z'ubwoba. Dufasha gusobanukirwa ingorane kandi dongere ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi bwawe.

tax.title: Ubunyangamugayo bw'umusoro
tax.description: Abahanga bacu b'umusoro batanga serivisi z'ubwoba z'ubwoba z'umusoro n'ukwemera kugira ngo dukemere umusoro wawe mugihe dukemeza ukwemera kw'ubwoba ku mategeko yose y'umusoro n'ubwoba.

advisory.title: Ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi
advisory.description: Serivisi zacu z'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubucuruzi zifasha amashyira gukurikirana ingorane z'ubwoba z'ubucuruzi, zongere ubwoba, kandi zigeze ku bwoba bw'ubucuruzi binyuze mu bwoba n'ubwoba.

risk.title: Gucunga ingorane
risk.description: Serivisi zacu z'ubwoba z'ingorane zifasha amashyira gusobanukirwa, gupima, no gukumira ingorane zishobora gukangiza intego z'ubucuruzi n'ubwoba.

hr.title: Serivisi z'ubwoba n'ubwoba
hr.description: Serivisi zacu z'ubwoba n'ubwoba zifasha amashyira gucunga ibintu by'ubwoba byabo - abantu babo - mugihe dukemeza ukwemera ku mategeko y'ubwoba n'ubwoba.

detailedServices.needCustomSolution: Ukeneye isubizo ry'ubwoba? Abahanga bacu barimo gufasha.

process.title: Uburyo bwacu
process.subtitle: Uburyo bwo gukora bwo gutanga serivisi z'ubucuruzi z'ubwoba zashyizweho ku byo ukeneye by'ubwoba.

steps.title: Gusanga n'Ubushakashatsi
steps.description: Dutangira no gusobanukirwa ibyo ukeneye by'ubucuruzi, ingorane, n'intego binyuze mu makuru n'ubushakashatsi bw'ubwoba.

steps.title: Gutanga n'Ubwoba
steps.description: Dutezimbere gahunda y'ubwoba y'ubwoba n'intego z'ubwoba, amahitamo y'igihe, n'ibyo dushyiraho byashyizweho ku byo ukeneye.

steps.title: Gutangira Ikipe
steps.description: Ikipe yacu y'ubuhanga itangwa ku bwoba bwawe, ikemeza ubuhanga n'ubuhanga bwo gukora ku byo ukeneye by'ubwoba.

steps.title: Gukora
steps.description: Dukora serivisi zemewe n'ubwoba, dukomeza ubwoba ku buryo bwo gukora.

steps.title: Gusuzuma n'Ubwoba
steps.description: Dutanga raporo n'ubushakashatsi bw'ubwoba, dukemeza ubwoba bw'ubwoba n'ukwemera kw'ibisubizo.

steps.title: Gufasha ku Bwoba
steps.description: Ubwoba bwacu bukomeza hamwe n'ubwoba bw'ubwoba, gusuzuma by'ubwoba, n'ubunyangamugayo bw'ubwoba bw'ubwoba.

process.readyDescription: Ikipe yacu y'abahanga iteguye kuyobora binyuze mu buryo bwacu kandi gutanga serivisi z'ubucuruzi z'ubwoba ku bwoba bwawe.

pricing.title: Ubwoba
pricing.subtitle: Hitamo gahunda y'ubwoba ku byo ukeneye by'ubwoba. Nta mafaranga y'ubwoba, kuraho igihe icyo ari cyo cyose.

enterprise.name: Ubwoba
enterprise.description: Ku bikoresho by'ubwoba n'ibyo ukeneye by'ubwoba

pricing.needCustomSolution: Ukeneye isubizo ry'ubwoba? Dutanga amapaki y'ubwoba ku bikoresho n'ibyo ukeneye by'ubwoba.
pricing.expertsHelp: Abahanga bacu barimo gufasha hitamo isubizo ry'ubwoba ku byo ukeneye by'ubwoba. Gutegura ubunyangamugayo bwa mahirwe bwa minota 30 kugira ngo dusuzume ibyo ukeneye.

hero.title: Ibyerekeye EXCI-MAA
hero.subtitle: Umufatanyabikorwa wawe w'ubucuruzi wizewe
hero.description: Hamwe n'imyaka irenga 27 y'ubwoba mu serivisi z'ubucuruzi, EXCI-MAA yabaye umufatanyabikorwa wizewe ku bikoresho mu mahanga menshi, itanga serivisi z'ubuhanga mu kubara, ubugenzuzi, n'ubunyangamugayo.

mission.title: Intego yacu
mission.description1: Intego yacu nyamukuru ni ugufasha no kuyobora ibikoresho bikora mu isoko ry'Abanyafurika kugera ku bwoba bw'ubucuruzi. Dukoresha ubumenyi buhagije bw'ibice byose by'ubucuruzi n'ibitarabucuruzi, dutanga ubunyangamugayo, ubugenzuzi bw'amategeko, n'ubunyangamugayo bwashyizweho ku bwoba bw'ikigo cyose.
mission.description2: Ibisubizo byacu byashyizweho gukemura ibyifuza by'ibikoresho ku gace kose ka Afurika, dutanga serivisi yose n'akamaro k'ukuri—ku giciro cy'ubwoba. Ikipe yacu ifite ubuhanga bwinshi n'amaofisi bw'isi yose ihamya gufasha bwashyizweho, byashyizweho ku bwoba n'ubushobozi bw'ubwoba bwawe.

story.title: Inkuru yacu
story.description1: EXCI-MAA yashinzwe n'abahanga mu bugenzuzi, kubara, umusoro, ubwoba bw'ubucuruzi, sisitemu y'amakuru y'ubuyobozi, n'amategeko. Hamwe n'ubwoba mu Kanada, Leta Zunze Ubumwe z'Amerika, Ubufaransa, Ubwongereza, n'Afurika yose, duhana ubuhanga bw'isi bwashyizweho ku bwoba bw'umuturage wose.
story.description2: Dukora ku murongo wose w'akamaro k'ibikorwa by'abakiriya bacu, dukomeza ubwoba n'ukwemera n'abafatanyabikorwa. Ikigo cyacu kiyobora amashyira mu mahanga menshi binyuze mu murongo ukomeye n'amatsinda ku butaka, atanga serivisi y'ubwoba n'ibisubizo byashyizweho ku nyacyo z'umuturage.
story.description3: Uyu munsi, dukomeza kwongera ubwoba bwacu mugihe dukomeza kwizera ku ntego zacu z'ubwoba: ubwoba, kwemera, n'ingaruka. Kuva ku bugenzuzi bw'amategeko n'ibyemezo kugeza ku kuyobora ingorane n'ubunyangamugayo bwashyizweho, amatsinda yacu atanga imirimo ikomeye n'ikora itanga ibisubizo bikomeye.
services: Gufasha ku bwoba bw'ubwoba, guhuza, gukora cyangwa guhindura
Ubunyangamugayo bwashyizweho ku bikoresho n'ibikoresho bito n'ibyagutse

history.title: Urugendo rwacu
history.subtitle: Imyaka irenga 20 y'ubwoba mu serivisi z'ubucuruzi

timeline.title: Gushyiraho EXCI-MAA
timeline.description: Yashyizweho mu Yaoundé, Kameruni, hamwe n'intego yo gutanga serivisi z'ubwoba z'ubucuruzi n'ubucuruzi ku bikoresho by'umuturage.

timeline.title: Kwongera ku gace
timeline.description: Serivisi zongerewe gufasha Afurika yo hagati, zashyiraho amabiro mu nkengero z'ubucuruzi z'ingenzi ku gace.

timeline.title: Kwemera ku isi yose
timeline.description: Bahabwe kwemera ku isi yose ku bwoba bw'ubwoba mu serivisi z'ubucuruzi n'ubwoba bw'ukwemera.

timeline.title: Guhindura ikoranabuhanga
timeline.description: Byashyizweho ubuhanga bw'ubucuruzi bw'ubwoba bwo gufasha serivisi n'ubwoba bw'abakiriya.

timeline.title: Ofisi dufite ku isi yose
timeline.description: Byashyizweho ubufatanyabikorwa n'amashyira y'isi yose, serivisi zongerewe ku bakiriya mu mahanga 6+.

timeline.title: Ubwoba bw'ikipe
timeline.description: Ikipe yacu yongereye kugeza ku bahanga 50+, byongereye ubwoba bwacu nk'ikigo cy'ubwoba cy'ubucuruzi.

history.journeyContinues: Urugendo rwacu rukomeza mugihe dukomeza ubwoba mu serivisi yose dutanga.
